statements: DELETE FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 105 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 123 AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE order_id = 456 AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
